(1) Using the salts provided in the VL cabinet determine the heat of solution of MgSO4, K2SO4, KNO3 and NH4NO3.


Insulate the container you use for the calorimeter (right click on the container and check "insulate"). Assume that the calorimeter container does not absorb any heat. The Virtual Lab is set up to enable you to determine the literature values for the heats of solution which are required in the wet lab.
